registration.name: @:service-manager
registration.title: Register a [[@:sm.registration.name]] Endpoint
registration.p1: [[@:sm.registration.name]] supports the full lifecycle for deploying, managing and upgrading services deployed in the Control Plane.
registration.p2: Register an existing [[@:sm.registration.name]] to allow Console administrators to view services.
registration.p3: When registering, choose a unique, recognizable name so that your developers can easily know which [[@:sm.registration.name]] endpoint they are working with.
registration.tagline: [[@:sm.registration.name]] allows you to view the services deployed in the Control Plane.
